title: Pointstone System Cleaner 7.3.8.360 [BUZZccd]
description:
System Cleaner - a tool for restoring hard-drive space - temporary and log files, cookies and other files in the browser cache, etc. The program knows more than a hundred of extensions used to refer to temporary files, allowing you to automate the process of cleaning the hard disk from junk nakapalivayuschegosya time. On the other hand, you can search and delete files with any other extensions. In addition, the program allows the removal of invalid entries from the applet "Add or Remove Programs." It is important that System Cleaner allows safe disposal - without any possibility to restore utilities. The program has a simple and easy to use interface.

System Cleaner Ã¢â€žÂ¢ is a tool for restoring hard-drive space, cleaning up the history of your activities on your computer and keeping your system running like new. The program allows you to clean your drives from unnecessary and temporary files, including your browser cache, cookies, history, recent document list, temporary files, errant uninstall entries and more. It targets more than 100 file extensions, which enable it to scan and recognize most of the unnecessary files on your computer. You can choose to delete the files to the recycle bin or to a specified backup folder. In addition, System Cleaner includes a Windows Startup manager and also allows you to remove invalid uninstaller information from the registry as well as a restore wizard to undo the changes if needed.

Key Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restores your hard drive's performance, hard-drive space and protect your privacy by cleaning Internet history, cache, temporary files, Windows temp files, recent document list, find history, run history, *. CHK files, the recycle bin, additional garbage and much, much more.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scans dead shortcuts from your Start menu and Desktop. If it finds any shortcuts that point to files that do not exist, it will list them for you.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Lets you delete or disable entries that automatically start on Windows startup. This pulls all entries from your Start Menu-Programs-Startup folder as well as from the registry.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Define your own user defined items to remove (specified files or folders).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Backup files to a ZIP file or proprietary file format. You can later restore individual files using the "Restore Wizard".
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Clean Directories and Internet Cache Files. Allows you to clean directories that usually have Temporary Files or cache files (Windows Temp Directory, Documents Folder, MS Internet Explorer Cache Directory and Netscape Cache Directory).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Powerful file search. You can select to scan for files between a certain date, with some or all file attributes, with a certain size or with the contents of a file matching a user-defined text string.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Remove files to Recycle Bin, zip them, move them to a folder or completely delete them!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scans multiple hard drives.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixes system errors that slow your PC down and cause it to crash
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Speeds up your PC's execution of software programs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Removes space-wasting temporary files and other unnecessary disk clutter
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tunes up and optimizes the Windows Registry
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Erases all evidence of your computer and internet activity
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Makes your PC boot faster
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Makes your PC shutdown faster
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fine-tunes all important Windows settings

Summary of the main features of the program:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restores and frees up space on your hard drive, stores privacy by cleaning your personal information online, clearing history, cache, clear the temporary files, Windows and Internet Explorer, clean junk files, garbage, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scans for invalid shortcuts to "Start" menu and desktop.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Allows you to disable / remove entries that automatically start Windows.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Backing up data in a ZIP-file
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cleaning the folders on your hard drive and Internet directories of debris and unnecessary files (temporary files, cache, etc.)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Powerful file search.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The ability to delete files in the Recycle Bin, or backup files in the ZIP-archive, or migrate files to a specific folder, or a complete deletion of files - your choice.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scan multiple drives.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Correction of errors in your system that can reduce the performance of your computer.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Accelerate and improve computer performance.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Set up and optimize your registry.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Complete cleaning of the computer and Internet activity.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optimization of system load.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optimize landing system (shutdown).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Setting the parameters of hidden Windows.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And much more ...
